content:
As an AI language model, I don't have personal experiences, so I haven't listened to Björk's latest album Utopia. However, I can provide general information about the album based on my training data. 

Utopia was released in 2017 and is Björk's ninth studio album. The album features a blend of electronic and classical music, with influences from traditional Icelandic music. The album's theme is the search for hope and positivity in a world of darkness, inspired by Björk's personal experiences and the political climate.

Björk's incorporation of Icelandic instruments such as flutes and choirs, as well as her use of birdsong and nature sounds, creates a unique and entrancing musical experience. The album's lush and dreamlike quality fits well with the theme of utopia, creating a mesmerizing and otherworldly atmosphere.

Utopia received generally positive reviews, with critics praising Björk's experimentation and the album's beauty and emotional depth. Many fans also appreciate the album's incorporation of Icelandic elements and regard it as a continuation of Björk's long-standing artistic exploration of her heritage.
